net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class RenderChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.PageElementChain
      • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.RenderChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class RenderChain
extends PageElementChain
    Allows nesting of render calls by page elements / Renderers.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

        Parameters:
        rc - the RenderContext.
        pageElementPath - the PageElementPath.
        start - the start of the chain.
        currentPath - the current path or null.
        pw - the print writer. May be null. Specified to override default writer.

      • delegateRender

        public void delegateRender(PageElement pe)
                    throws IOException,
                           ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException
        Delegate to a page element that is not in the render chain. Elements not in the chain are ones that are handled dynamically.
        Parameters:
        pe - The page element.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurs.
        ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException - if a resource cannot be accessed.
        See Also:
        ContentElement.getDelegates()
